summary: An email from Marc A. Weinstein, a partner at Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP, to an unspecified recipient (addressed as 'Mrs') with Andrew Tomback copied, offering an update on a new development regarding the Epstein Estate. The email is dated November 9, 2020, and contains a standard confidentiality disclaimer.

persons.name: Marc A. Weinstein
persons.role: Partner, Chair of White Collar Defense at Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP
persons.context: The sender of the email, offering an update on the Epstein Estate to the recipient.

persons.name: Andrew Tomback
persons.context: Copied on the email regarding the Epstein Estate update.

connections.description: Both are involved in legal correspondence regarding the Epstein Estate, with Tomback copied on Weinstein's email.

events.title: Epstein Estate Update Communication
events.description: Marc A. Weinstein emails an unspecified recipient (and copies Andrew Tomback) to schedule a call regarding a new development on the Epstein Estate.

keyFacts: The email is dated November 9, 2020, indicating ongoing legal activity related to the Epstein Estate over a year after Jeffrey Epstein's death.
Marc A. Weinstein, a white-collar defense partner at Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP, is communicating about a 'new development' regarding the estate.
Andrew Tomback is copied on the correspondence, suggesting his involvement in the estate matter.
The primary recipient is addressed as 'Mrs' but is not named in the provided text.
The email includes a standard legal confidentiality disclaimer, indicating the sensitive nature of the communication.
